title: FPS Lag Spikes After 5.5
body:
Hi!

After updating to patch 5.5, and with absolutely NO changes to my computer's hardware or software setup, I often get FPS drops to 8 - 10 for around 4 seconds or so, and often during important events such as teamfights or dragons.

Can anyone help me with this issue?
Cheers!

replies.body:
This is a known and (at least by me) accepted bug.

Well, not really a bug, this almost seems intended. It's existed ever since the new SR came out, and its noticeability has increased/decreased each patch since.
